timeline.message: Check for windows return and modify tests

timeline.bodyText:
a little odd that we don't flush when the c is a '\n'
is this really
assert(c!= '\n');
?
timeline.author: jacob314

timeline.bodyText: somewhat minor: do we have to worry about \r or \n in the middle of a json block? I don't know off the top of my head how the dart json encoder deals with them.
timeline.author: jacob314

replies.bodyText: It seems this is dealt with fine, I tried putting \r, \n and \r\n in the middle of flutter tools output and it's recognized correctly.
replies.author: helin24

timeline.message: Add test for removing next newline char
